title: Did Michael Bloomberg Say Donald Trump Is a ‘Con Artist’ and a ‘Cheat’?
subtitle: Michael Bloomberg did call Donald Trump's candidacy a "con," but he didn't refer to Trump as a "con artist" and a "cheat."
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Michael Bloomberg said that Donald Trump was known among millionaires as a 'con artist,' and among business owners as a 'cheat.'
